title: IAA Tonight | Should Tua Have Been Allowed to Finish the Game?
description: Miami Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa appeared to be concussed after taking a hit against the Buffalo Bills this past Sunday but passed concussion protocols and remained in the game. Brandon Marshall, LeSean McCoy and Leger Douzable discuss some of the risks they and other athletes have taken in order to stay in games and play through injuries.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, LeSean McCoy, Brandon Marshall)
